This list does not include solo material or sideprojects performed by the members. White Lion is an [[United States|American]]/[[Denmark|Danish]] [[glam metal]] band that formed in [[New York City]] in 1983 by [[Denmark|Danish]] vocalist [[Mike Tramp]] and [[United States|American]] guitarist [[Vito Bratta]]. Mainly active in the 1980s and early 1990s, the band achieved double platinum status, with their #3 hit "When the Children Cry" from their second album "[[Pride (White Lion album)|Pride]]"{{cite web|url = {{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p5817|pure_url=yes}}|title = The Billboard hot 100|publisher=}}. The band continued their success with their third album "[[Big Game (album)|Big Game]]".
